items.title: Login Button Implementation
items.description: Add a clickable login button on the application's login screen to initiate the authentication process.
acceptance_criteria: Login button is visible on the login screen in the designated UI layout.
Clicking the login button triggers the authentication request process.
Button is disabled while authentication request is in progress.
Button label reads 'Login' and follows the design specifications.
non_functional: Button must respond to clicks within 100ms.
Button styling must comply with accessibility guidelines (contrast ratio at least 4.5:1).

notes: Assumed standard login flow with backend authentication; no specific design or platform details provided.
